name: Crime vs Police
description:
Meet the new racing & shooting game on the most popular 90s and
2000s crime cars. Play as criminal racer versus police, use nitro and
wipe out the cops with the legendary USSR and Russian weapon!

Crime vs Police - Shooting Car Racing 3D - this is an amazing drive shooting
game where you act as racer vs cops or cop versus crime racers.

BONUS: Real russian cop walkie-talkie!

Most popular bandit automobiles of 90's and 2000's. Show your skills in the
death race and shooting rivals to survive in this auto hell. Choose your
side, who you are: evil cop or mad racer who have nothing to lose? Road
of fury will be your new home for an unlimited time.

Compete in the extreme speed driving, use nitro for fast acceleration, crush your
opponents with legendary Russian weapon. Beware of the enemy fire to
save your car and yourself. Come first and open new roads. Get your main
reward for good shooting - CASH.

Tune your russian, german and japan cars in your crime/cops garage:

EIGHTBALL (VAZ 2108), PRIORA (ВАЗ 2170), BENZ (MB W140), BULLDOG (Pajero II),  BEAMER (e38), DOUBLE R (RR Sport III), CUBE, GOAT COP, VOLGA FSB.

Your upgrades: motor tuning, car armour, suspension, tires, weapon and nitro.
Russian weapons are:

- AKS-74
- PK
- RPG-7
- KPV
- KORNET
- KRASUKHA EW SYSTEM
- AKSU-74
- VSK

Features and benefits of the game Crime vs Police - Shooting Car Racing 3D:

- Realistic physics
- Mad race and original tracks (city, forest, beach)
- Great car models
- Cars tuning
- Many weapons
- Great music and graphics optimised for different devices

And
you can play as angry cop - the same shooting car racing only on police
car. Enjoy, put five stars, write your reviews please. Thank you!
